attributes.action: Hold a vote in Parliament on to trigger new EU membership referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Fraud by false representation (Section 2)
The defendant: 

made a false representation 
dishonestly 
knowing that the representation was or might be untrue or misleading 
with intent to make a gain for himself or another, to cause loss to another or to expose another to risk of loss.
The offence is entirely focused on the conduct of the defendant.
attributes.background: During the run up to the referendum the Leave campaign was guilty of false representation as defined in the The Fraud Act 2006. As a large number of people were mislead by this information the referendum result should be considered void and a new referendum triggered.

rejection.details: We think this petition is very similar to the one you submitted: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/148559
